text: Ananias Djalma da Silva Júnior (born 17 April 1990), commonly known as Júnior Silva, is a former Brazilian footballer. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Porto Alegre |2011 |colspan="3" rowspan="2"|– |6Appearances in the Campeonato Gaúcho||0||0||0||0||0||6||0 |- |Hercílio Luz |2016 |1Appearances in the Campeonato Catarinense Divisão Especial||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !0!!0!!7!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!7!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Esporte Clube Pelotas players Category:Porto Alegre Futebol Clube players Category:Grêmio Esportivo Glória players Category:Riograndense Futebol Clube players
